hero_subtitle: Experience luxury transportation with our Hyundai Staria 2025
service_airport_desc: Seamless transfers from airports to hotels and accommodations across Tunisia. Premium comfort and punctual service.
service_tours_desc: Discover Tunisia's treasures with our personalized multi-day tour packages. From ancient ruins to stunning coastlines.
service_group_desc: Up to 8 passengers in comfort. Perfect for families and groups.
service_partners_desc: We work with trusted taxi partners to accommodate any group size.
vehicle_features: Spacious Interior, Air Conditioning, USB Charging, Luggage Space, Comfortable Seating, Panoramic Windows
vehicle_more: Need more vehicles? We work with trusted taxi partners to accommodate larger groups.

review_1_text: "We've had a great 7 days with brother Mehdi, became like family. Fabulous service, English speaking, knowledgeable. Will definitely recommend him to family and friends who come to Tunisia."
review_2_text: "Amazing service and perfect at all levels Thank you very much for the great hospitality."
review_3_text: "Mehdi has so much passion as a tour guide. He is a professional, kind and caring man. I highly recommend VIP Taxi Service. I have travelled to numerous countries and never seen somebody so accommodating and passionate with his work. Thank you Mehdi for the lovely journey in Tunisia you made our stay extra special. A bond with a stranger became family ❤️."
contact_message: Do not hesitate to contact us for any question or request.
